metadata.title: First Complete Genome Sequence of a Feline Alphacoronavirus 1 Strain from Brazil

abstract.original_text: We identified a strain of Alphacoronavirus 1, FCoV-SB22, from a pool of fecal samples from domestic cats from a rural settlement in the municipality of Santa B치rbara, Par치, Brazil. The nucleotide identity with feline coronavirus was 91.5%. The present study reports the first complete genome sequence of a feline coronavirus from Brazil.

FCoV-SB22 , from a pool of fecal samples from domestic cats from a rural settlement in the municipality of Santa B치rbara , Par치 , Brazil .
